known_issues: Uploaded custom app icon in header is not showing/displaying correctly (reason unspecified); user wants to revert to a default-style music icon.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Neon-green music note icon with white outline on transparent background (header-music-note.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current header logo image in `frontend/src/components/branding/AppHeader.tsx` with a neon-green music note icon that has a white outline, while keeping the headerâ€™s existing sizing, alignment, spacing, and layout unchanged (do not change wrapper classes like `w-10 h-10`, padding, flex layout, or gaps).
Add the new music-note icon image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it directly from the header `` (do not route image loading through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace current header app icon with a neon-green music note icon with a white outline, keeping size/alignment/spacing and all header layout/navigation unchanged
Do not modify navigation behavior or any other header functionality; only change the header icon image source to the new music-note icon.

projectName: Restore header icon to neon-green music note (white outline) without changing header layout
